LanguageData.AS_Handgun.label: Ancient Elf Handgun
LanguageData.AS_Handgun.description: A pistol made with an ancient technology. The barrel is long, has a sense of stability, and has a good design and weight for handling.
LanguageData.AS_Grawehr.label: Grawehr
LanguageData.AS_Grawehr.description: A rifle that shoots grenades. Creates a small explosion at the point of impact, dealing damage to the opponent.
